tool.name: run_sast_scan
tool.description: Perform a lightweight static scan of Python files to flag risky constructs (eval/exec, shell=True, weak randomness) for quick triage.

parameter.name: target_path
parameter.description: Path to scan (defaults to current working directory).

parameter.name: max_files
parameter.description: Optional cap on number of files to scan (default 200).

returns.description: Findings grouped under 'static' with file, line, rule_id, severity, and message.

tool.name: scan_dependencies
tool.description: Collect Python dependencies from requirements.txt or pyproject.toml and flag unpinned or wildcard versions.

parameter.name: target_path
parameter.description: Path to scan (defaults to current working directory).

returns.description: Dependency findings under 'dependencies' with package, spec, severity, and reason.
